feed.title: Settlement Watch - Legal Settlement Feed
feed.subtitle: Legal settlement discoveries from federal and state courts

entry.title: [$8.9 Billion] Johnson & Johnson Talc Settlement
entry.summary: Settlement for talc-related cancer claims. Amount: $8.9 Billion. Source: Class Action MDL

entry.title: [$6 Billion] 3M Military Earplug Settlement
entry.summary: Settlement for defective combat earplugs. Amount: $6 Billion. Source: MDL 2885

entry.title: [$3.7 Billion] Wells Fargo Fake Accounts Settlement
entry.summary: CFPB settlement for unauthorized account openings. Amount: $3.7 Billion. Source: CFPB

entry.title: [$1.2 Billion] Juul E-Cigarette Marketing Settlement
entry.summary: Settlement with states over youth marketing. Amount: $1.2 Billion. Source: State AGs

entry.title: [$725 Million] Facebook Privacy Settlement
entry.summary: Cambridge Analytica data sharing settlement. Amount: $725 Million. Source: Class Action

entry.title: [$425 Million] Equifax Data Breach Settlement
entry.summary: FTC settlement for 2017 breach. Amount: $425 Million. Source: FTC

entry.title: [$392 Million] Google Location Tracking Settlement
entry.summary: Settlement with 40 states over location tracking. Amount: $392 Million. Source: State AGs

entry.title: [$350 Million] T-Mobile Data Breach Settlement
entry.summary: 2021 data breach settlement. Amount: $350 Million. Source: Class Action
